metadata.title: CVE-2021-43299 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Stack overflow in PJSUA API when calling pjsua_player_create. Anattacker-controlled 'filename' argument may cause a buffer overflow sinceit is copied to a fixed-size stack buffer without any size validation.

criterions.comment: pjproject: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
